docs.abstract: Oscar Pistorius, leaving witness stand, reads Valentine's card that he received from his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp minutes before he shot her; tearful moment on the stand follows days of grueling cross-examination in which prosecutors have accused the athlete of lying and changing his testimony.
